net.rim.device.api.database
Class DatabaseOptionsSetInvalidKeyException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          net.rim.device.api.database.DatabaseOptionsSetException
              net.rim.device.api.database.DatabaseOptionsSetInvalidKeyException

public final class DatabaseOptionsSetInvalidKeyException
extends DatabaseOptionsSetException

Indicates that the set method was called with an invalid key.

Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0
